Articles.Content:
Been playing KSP (and lurking on the forums) for a few months now, figured I'd finally join in properly.

I kinda suck at planes, but I love rockets, and all the trappings thereof.

-Cheers!

Planes are more easily controlled with a flight sim joystick providing you are able to interface one to the sim. Otherwise, rockets are far less demanding only requiring occasional guidance for doing an gravity turn or maneuver alignment.

Greetings. If you need help with anything Kerbal, shoot a message at one of the more experienced (i.e. not me) forumgoers. One of my favorite things about the KSP community is that if you need help with something, post on the forums and chances are you'll get a reply in less than six hours.

Thanks for the welcome, guys! though I'm new to the forums, I'm not a total newb at running my space program. Think I've watched nearly all of Scott Manley's videos, and I had a fairly impressive (in my mind) Kethane mining operation going before .21 wiped it.

Though... haven't left the Kerbin system yet, working on plans to check out duna.
